argumentText:
ARGUMENT

| Step | Hyp | Ref | Expression |
|---|---|---|---|

| 1 |  | #P_le0neg1 | |- ( A e. RR -> ( A <_ 0 <-> 0 <_ -u A ) ) |
| 2 |  | #P_recn | |- ( A e. RR -> A e. CC ) |
| 3 |  | #P_absneg | |- ( A e. CC -> ( abs ` -u A ) = ( abs ` A ) ) |
| 4 | 2, 3 | #P_syl | |- ( A e. RR -> ( abs ` -u A ) = ( abs ` A ) ) |
| 5 | 4 | #P_adantr | |- ( ( A e. RR /\ 0 <_ -u A ) -> ( abs ` -u A ) = ( abs ` A ) ) |
| 6 |  | #P_renegcl | |- ( A e. RR -> -u A e. RR ) |
| 7 |  | #P_absid | |- ( ( -u A e. RR /\ 0 <_ -u A ) -> ( abs ` -u A ) = -u A ) |
| 8 | 6, 7 | #P_sylan | |- ( ( A e. RR /\ 0 <_ -u A ) -> ( abs ` -u A ) = -u A ) |
| 9 | 5, 8 | #P_eqtr3d | |- ( ( A e. RR /\ 0 <_ -u A ) -> ( abs ` A ) = -u A ) |
| 10 | 9 | #P_ex | |- ( A e. RR -> ( 0 <_ -u A -> ( abs ` A ) = -u A ) ) |
| 11 | 1, 10 | #P_sylbid | |- ( A e. RR -> ( A <_ 0 -> ( abs ` A ) = -u A ) ) |
| 12 | 11 | #P_imp | |- ( ( A e. RR /\ A <_ 0 ) -> ( abs ` A ) = -u A ) |
